subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Before Friday’s N.I.T. Season Tip-Off final, Mike Krzyzewski and Jim Calhoun, who have more than 800 career victories each, had not faced off in five years.
snippet: Before Friday’s N.I.T. Season Tip-Off final, Mike Krzyzewski and Jim Calhoun, who have more than 800 career victories each, had not faced off in five years.
